title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and many others.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: A polished open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Community Go CLI that wraps Ollama’s REST endpoints for quick model pulls and prompts from the terminal.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-rag (Chroma example)
summary: Official example showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-copilot (vscode-ollama)
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline copilots or chat panels.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial wrapper)
summary: Lightweight community npm package that wraps the Ollama REST API for Node projects.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent DSL and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, completion, and embeddings with async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including CPU-only and NVIDIA GPU variants.

title: ollama-rag-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit app that lets you chat with local PDFs using Ollama + Chroma RAG.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization, Q&A, and rewriting on your vault notes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightning-fast Slack bot using Bolt JS and Ollama for on-prem AI assistance.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library that wraps Ollama for chat and embeddings with GenServer-based connection pooling.
